page.title: 14The Ufton Flower Festival.
page.content: This festival takes place annually on one day usually in early July.Private gardens and the church are open to the public. From the bottom of some of the gardens along the escarpment is a magnificient view of the surrounding countryside.A lot of flowers and vegetables are grown in the gardens. Some of the gardens have small aviaries in them.Also,a lot of trees are grown and the gardens are imacculately kept.Most of the gardens have paths in them but one particular garden has no proper paths but has worn down narrow tracks in the old cottage style. Approximately two or three gardens have ponds.Older properties tend to have kitchen gardens whilst newer homes have a recreational function.
